description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bochum vs Stuttgart in the Bundesliga
title: Bochum vs Stuttgart: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Bochum vs Stuttgart: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Post
Dani de Wit (VfL Bochum 1848) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!
Goal! VfL Bochum 1848 0, VfB Stuttgart 4. Ermedin Demirovic (VfB Stuttgart) left footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Leonidas Stergiou with a cross.
Post
Attempt missed. Mats Pannewig (VfL Bochum 1848) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Maximilian Wittek following a set piece situation.
